title: 2 week ban for no reason ?? could this happen to you ??
body:
I was fortunate enough to be teamed with a troll
who stole my leash and ran to bot lane.
He laughed and trolled me in chat also.
I then went str8 to bot lane and fed the enemy bot lane until we surrendered.
I was reported and banned for 2 weeks. 
Would i have gotten justice had i not /intent feed???????
what would you do???????? is riot playing favourites for banning me and not him????? lel

replies.body:
.>2 week ban for no reason ??
.>Would i have gotten justice had i not /intent feed???????

Lol.

Yeah, I laughed at that too.

Title as well. 

This dude's post in summary:

"I got banned for doing nothing wrong. But I intentionally fed. But I did nothing wrong."
